text: Ayushmann Khurrana (born Nishant Khurrana on 14 September 1984) is an Indian actor and singer. He works in Hindi-language movies. He has gotten many awards, including one National Film Award and four Filmfare Awards. He is known for his roles in Bareilly Ki Barfi (2017), Shubh Mangal Saavdhan (2017), Andhadhun (2018), Badhaai Ho (2018), Dream Girl (2019), and Bala (2019), and Article 15 (2019). He was raised a Hindu and is now a Buddhist. In 2008 Khurrana married his best friend from childhood, Tahira Kashyap, who is a filmmaker (someone who makes movies). They have a son and daughter together. He also has a younger brother named Aparshakti Khurana, who is also an actor. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Reality show winners
title: Ayushmann Khurrana
